phrase: 0  The MPON requests a device takeover bid of the MPOO .
1  The MPOO sends a tender for the equipment takeover to the MPON .
2  The MPON places an order at the MPOO .

activity: Confirm order and transmission of master data
phrase: 3  The MPOO confirms the order of the MPON and sends the master data .

act id: error codes: missing activity = m, wrong order = w, ambiguous = a, else leave empty
The MPON requests a device takeover bid of the MPOO.
The MPOO sends a tender for the equipment takeover to the MPON.
The MPON places an order at the MPOO.
The MPOO confirms the order of the MPON and sends the master data.
